channel.title: Making a PK Box + Safe Zone?
channel.description:
Can anyone teach me how to create a box? Mainly a PK Box but i want to make a safe zone around the area...
If someone could tell me how to create a box then i can work from that... Thanks

item.title: Making a PK Box + Safe Zone?
item.dc:creator: @strn00b strn00b
item.description:
@strn00b wrote:

[quote=“pkinnubpk, post:4, topic:178640”]First search

public boolean nonWild()

goto the bottom of those codes, ender and add this:

Code:

|| (absX >= x1 && absX <= x2 && absY >= y1 && absY <=y2)

Ok now goto the most Southwest corner of the area you want to be a safe zone, get the coords and put them in x1 and y1,
now goto the most northeast corner of the area and put them in as x2 and y2.[/quote]
im new, what do i look for this in what file? client.java? (server side)?

Read full topic
item.source: Making a PK Box + Safe Zone?

item.title: Making a PK Box + Safe Zone?
item.dc:creator: @viruz_3 viruz 3
item.description:
@viruz_3 wrote:

[quote=“pkinnubpk, post:4, topic:178640”]First search

public boolean nonWild()

goto the bottom of those codes, ender and add this:

Code:

|| (absX >= x1 && absX <= x2 && absY >= y1 && absY <=y2)

Ok now goto the most Southwest corner of the area you want to be a safe zone, get the coords and put them in x1 and y1,
now goto the most northeast corner of the area and put them in as x2 and y2.[/quote]
THANK YOU… This is wonderfull

@pkinnubpk wrote:

First search

public boolean nonWild()

goto the bottom of those codes, ender and add this:

Code:

|| (absX >= x1 && absX <= x2 && absY >= y1 && absY <=y2)

Ok now goto the most Southwest corner of the area you want to be a safe zone, get the coords and put them in x1 and y1,
now goto the most northeast corner of the area and put them in as x2 and y2.
